objectives.primary_objective: Understand the parts of a plant and their functions - Parts of a Plant - Introduction

content_blocks.text: Today we will learn about parts of a plant - introduction.
Plants have roots, stems, leaves, flowers, and fruits. Each part has a special job.
Observe a plant near you and point to its roots, stem, and leaves.
Roots fix the plant, stems carry water, leaves make food, and flowers grow into fruits.
